Articles.Content:
Hi folks! I saw mention of KSP about 5 days ago on an IRC channel I idle in, and so wandered over and had a look, downloaded it....

...and have been hooked ever since!

I\'ve gotten the hang of basic orbits fairly quickly (years of watching the Apollo program: Neil Armstrong set foot on the Moon when I was 8! - an abiding interest in Sci-Fi and a good scientific grounding)

I am still getting to grips with Mun landings at the moment. My craft end up way too big & ungainly, and/or I burn up excessive fuel in getting my initial orbits on a correct 90 degree incllination.

Ahh, baby steps....

As soon as I get some spare cash, I will be donating without hesitation. This game is so worth it.

I sincerely feel this game will be the 'new minecraft' (I am meaning here in terms of poularity from an initially small aplha release: don\'t know if this has been said by others before).

Since raving on about it on IRC, I\'ve now gotten another 4 or 5 converts to the KSP cause, all madly building and crashing spacecraft.

I currently have only one question: is it true that someone has slipped a little extra something into Jeb\'s food pills? he always seems so happy when his two colleagues are bricking themselves over the very apparent impending doom!

Joe

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!
